listings.title: Charming Poulsbo Craftsman
listings.description: Beautiful craftsman home in the heart of Poulsbo with original woodwork, updated kitchen, and a lovely backyard garden. Walking distance to downtown shops and restaurants. Features hardwood floors throughout, a cozy fireplace, and a spacious front porch perfect for relaxing.

listings.title: Silverdale Family Home
listings.description: Spacious family home near Silverdale's shopping and dining. Open floor plan with vaulted ceilings, modern kitchen with granite counters, and a large backyard perfect for entertaining. Close to excellent schools.

listings.title: Bainbridge Island Retreat
listings.description: Gorgeous island home with peek-a-boo water views. Features a gourmet kitchen, master suite with spa bath, bonus room, and beautifully landscaped grounds. Easy ferry commute to Seattle.

listings.title: Bremerton Waterfront Condo
listings.description: Stunning waterfront condo with panoramic views of the Puget Sound and Seattle skyline. Modern open floor plan, chef's kitchen, and private balcony overlooking the water. Walk to downtown and the ferry.

listings.title: Port Orchard Starter Home
listings.description: Perfect starter home near downtown Port Orchard. Recently updated with new roof, windows, and fresh paint. Cozy living room, eat-in kitchen, and fenced backyard. Great location near waterfront and shops.

listings.title: Kingston Waterfront Estate
listings.description: Exceptional waterfront estate with stunning views of Puget Sound and the Cascade Mountains. Features include a gourmet kitchen, home office, wine cellar, and private beach access. Minutes from the Kingston ferry.
